domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse how to suppress science: Incredibly troubling to learn @AZDHS is disbanding team of researchers working on #COVID19 projections & will hold back special data used by the researchers. So, fewer experts and even less transparency as GovDucey reopens #AZ #gop #democrats #COVID19
